item.title: Notification to McDonald’s executives Gloria Santona, Steve Easterbrook, and Malcolm Hicks
item.description: From: Vincent B. Le Corre SUBJECT: defamation against my consumer protection websites DATE: December 8, 2016 at 00:05 (Beijing time +0800) TO : Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> I forgot to mention… As for me, I am going to file a lawsuit against “X” (but targeting McDonald’s) for, among other things, defamation. Indeed, it seems some of your executives were behind some defamatory comment against my websites. One such comment was saying that my website was the fraud.

item.title: White-Collar-Criminals.org, Accusation Against Malcolm Hicks: A Call for Immediate Response
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2015-12-15_2257_0800-accusing-malcolm-hicks-of-being-a-white-collar-criminal.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Right of reply Date sent: December 15, 2015, 22:57 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2015-12-15_2257_0800-accusing-malcolm-hicks-of-being-a-white-collar-criminal.pdf Mr. Hicks, I am accusing you of being a white-collar criminal. I’ve created the website white-collar-criminals.com and you will be listed on it from now on. I am offering you a right of reply but you must use it within 48 hours.

item.title: PLEASE STOP THE FRAUD!
item.description: From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: please stop the fraud! Date sent: 2015-10-30 at 22:25 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Steve Easterbrook <Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com>, Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> Dear Mr. Easterbrook, dear Ms. Santona, and dear Mr. Hicks, I repeat again. Please stop the fraud. You must make it stop! I know you know this “game” is a fraud under European laws. You can not possibly be so stupid not to understand except if you don’t understand on purpose so that you can later claim plausible deniability.

item.title: Malcolm Hicks, Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe and General Counsel
item.description:
Click on this link to visualize the original email: MCD-2–2015-10-23-05h34CN_Redacted.pdf

On October 23, 2015, I receive an email from Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> who is the Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe.

From: Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com>

Subject: France Monopoly Game Query

Date received: October 23, 2015 at 05:34 +0800 (Beijing time)

To: Vincent B. Le Corre
